events.name: Google I/O Extended 2017 Ado-Ekiti

venue.name: AB Emporium Hotel & Events Centre, Housing Road Adebayo
venue.address_1: AB Emporium Hotel & Events Centre, Housing Road Adebayo

events.description:
Google I/O is an annual developer festival. I/O Extended 2017 Ado-Ekiti is an event that brings students, tech enthusiasts, entrepreneurs and local developer communities together in Ado-Ekiti to experience the I/O keynotes and sessions with one another in real-time, discuss and network. We will also be offering codelabs and hackathons activities.

The event would last for 2 days where the first day would be for I/O keynotes and Codelabs sessions and intensive trainings for participants who want to learn how to develop Android Mobile Apps and the second day for hackathons, competitions, and demos. We would be inviting tech professionals on the second day to become judges to the competitions and whoever wins would be given an Android Mobile device as a prize.
events.how_to_find_us: Turn into the street opposite FirstBank, Adebayo

events.name: Google Developer Days Europe: Ado-Ekiti Extended
events.description:
Google Developer Days Europe: Extended events

On September 5-6, Google Developer Days Europe will take place in Kraków, featuring technical talks on Android, the Mobile Web, Firebase, Cloud, Machine Learning, and IoT.

You can join in by running a GDD Extended event in your Community, streaming the keynote and running local talks or codelabs. You can run your event during the event or at any date before December that works for you. Please, create your event at Meetup.com and then register it here, preferably by August 1st in order to make it appear on the map at developers.google.com/events/gdd-europe/extended.

events.name: Mobile Sites Certification Web Study Jam

venue.name: AB Emporium Hotel & Events Centre, Housing Road Adebayo
venue.address_1: AB Emporium Hotel & Events Centre, Housing Road Adebayo

events.description:
Today over 50% of web traffic goes to mobile yet unfortunately developers aren’t designing effectively for it. For example 53% of mobile visitors will leave if a page takes more than three seconds to load. The average page takes 19 seconds to load over 3G. Speed is just one part of creating better mobile experiences and best practice has gone a long way past responsive design alone. Are you up to date?

Want to get started on the Mobile Computing, but don't know where to begin?

Join us for our Mobile Sites Certification Web Study Jam Series.  You'll be taken through the fundamentals of Mobile Web development with Google tools. 

Join this meetup to get web development skills free of charge.

Bring a laptop (PC)! And Power Box

Timing:

Day 1: 10am - 5pm

Day 2: 10am - 5pm
events.how_to_find_us: Off First Bank, Adebayo, Ado Ekiti

events.name: Cloud Study Jam Series

venue.name: AB Emporium Hotel & Events Centre, Housing Road Adebayo
venue.address_1: AB Emporium Hotel & Events Centre, Housing Road Adebayo

events.description:
Want to get started on the Google Cloud, but don't know where to begin?
Join us for our Cloud Study Jam! Together we'll work through three Google Cloud Platform Essentials labs, then you will get free access to the next quest so you can finish this series of labs at home to get a Google-hosted badge for your online profile. You will be able to get hands-on experience with Docker, Kubernetes and Scientific Data Processing, which will earn you additional badges.
Join this meetup to get official Google training, a $70+ value, free of charge.
Bring a laptop (PC, Mac or Chromebook)! The labs will run on all of the latest versions of the popular browsers. For the best experience, make sure your laptop has Firefox or Chrome installed.

Agenda:
6:00pm: Three Google Cloud Platform Essentials labs
7:30pm: Break
8:00pm: Intro to Docker or Scientific Data Processing lab
9:00pm: Event ends

events.description: Google I/O is an annual developer festival. I/O Extended 2018 Ado-Ekiti is an event that brings students, tech enthusiasts, entrepreneurs and local developer communities together in Ado-Ekiti to experience the I/O keynotes and sessions with one another in real-time, discuss and network.
events.how_to_find_us: Turn into the street opposite FirstBank, Adebayo

events.name: Next '18 Extended Ado-Ekiti
events.description:
What's new at Google Cloud? A lot — from new enterprise capabilities, to new ways of building apps that link people and data, to harnessing the natural symbiosis of IoT, Big Data and AI to do more, know more, and achieve more.
Breakthrough building, higher learning, and faster everything.
See how more developers are rapidly innovating with Google Cloud. Hear from developer and startup leaders, and watch live demos.
Google Cloud leaders talked about how the cloud is transforming business, making artificial intelligence available to everyone, and improving the lives and circumstances of people around the world in ways never before possible.
events.how_to_find_us: Turn into the street opposite FirstBank, Adebayo

events.name: ARCore Event-in-a-Box Workshop
events.description:
ARCore is Google’s platform for building augmented reality experiences. Using different APIs, ARCore enables your phone to sense its environment, understand the world and interact with information. Some of the APIs are available across Android and iOS to enable shared AR experiences.

Also note you are to come along with your PC in other to achieve effective practical.

events.name: DevFest Lagos
events.description:
Join the Google Developers Groups in Lagos for DevFest Lagos, the biggest developer conference ever held in this region. This event will take place on Saturday November 3, 2018 and will feature over 24 different sessions planned across multiple parallel tracks on Android, Web, Cloud, Machine Learning and with still more to come.

To attend this event, you must register - visit bit.ly/devfestlagos18 to register while we still have seats! Registration is free.

events.name: Flutter Study Jams
events.description: Flutter Study Jams are Community-run study groups based on the Flutter Udacity Course. Participants learn how to use Flutter to develop high-quality, interactive mobile applications for iOS and Android devices.

events.name: Cloud Study Jams 2019 - Kubernetes Solutions
events.description:
Want to get started on the Google Cloud, but don't know where to begin? Join us for our Cloud Study Jam!

Get official Google training, a $55+ value, free of charge. Together we'll work through several Google Cloud labs. You will get hands-on experience with the Cloud Console, Kubernetes, Security, IoT on Cloud, and Machine Learning.

Then after our live session, you will have free access to more labs you can finish at home. Complete all labs in the quest and earn a Google-hosted badge for your online profile, and additional 30 days access to the training platform to compete any labs you want

Come along with your laptop and charger.

events.name: IWD Ado Ekiti
events.description:
2019 is here and we are already excited. Among the amazing opportunities that comes with the Women Techmakers(WTM) comunities is the International Womens Day(IWD) Celebrations.
Celebrating the women in STEM and beyond, WTM Communities from all over the world are continuously holding incredible extended events to provide an opportunity for their communities to have an experience of the IWD Summits that are held in various countries all over the world.

New year comes early!!!
Join Women Techmakers Nairobi on 20th April 2019 as they hold an amazing extended event.
Tell a friend and come for inspirational talks, hands on codelabs, sandbox sessions, access to amazing communication building workshops and a customized networking experience.

We can't wait to see you there!

What to bring:
-Your Laptop
-A notebook and a Pen
-Excitement
-A friend!!!

Note:
The event is welcome to all.

events.name: I/O Extended Ado Ekiti
events.description:
I/O Extended events help developers from around the world take part in the I/O experience.

What to expect & explore

I/O features hands-on learning, Google’s latest developer products, and technical talks given by the engineers who are developing our latest APIs and tools — plus a few surprises along the way.

We will also be laying our hands on a mobile app project from scratch and which we intend to deploy same day, this will be an avenue for those aspiring to be a mobile app developer to kick start their dream.

All the tools needed will be provided and there will be provision for Internet.

events.name: TensorFlow Dev Summit 2019 Extended
events.description:
#TFDevSummit #AdoEkiti is back! Join our Community on 11th May 2019 at the Mutual House Fajuyi Area for a look at new product updates & amazing work powered by TensorFlow.

TensorFlow Dev Summit Extended Ado Ekiti brings together a diverse mix of machine learning users from around the Ekiti for a day of highly technical talks, success stories, demos, and conversation with the TensorFlow peers and community.

Agenda:
=========
9:00 am: Doors Open
9:30 am: TensorFlow DevSummit Recap

The annual TensorFlow Developer Summit 2019 is taking place on March 6-7, 2019 in Mountain View. It covers new advances in machine learning research plus release announcements for new tools or features for ML developers. We'll do a quick review of the key announcements from the event.

10:00 am: TBA
5:00 pm: Doors Close

Space is limited, RSVP soon if you want to attend!

#TFDevSummit #AdoEkiti

events.name: Flutter Study Jams
events.description:
Join us for the Flutter Study Jam Sessions!
Fun, Food, Learning, Badge Earning!

WHAT?
Flutter Study Jams are Community-run study groups based on the Flutter Udacity Course. Participants learn how to use Flutter to develop high-quality, interactive mobile applications for iOS and Android devices.

WHY?
Study Jams are a great opportunity to bring members of your community together to learn Flutter in person and support them to complete the course. Everyone, who completes the course will get a Google-offered Study Jam completion certificate and a profile badge.

WHO?
Flutter Study Jam is suited best for: 1) those just getting started with mobile app development 2) those with programming experience on other mobile app frameworks.

HOW LONG?
3 in-person sessions to cover 7 hours long Udacity course.
What is the end result?
Create a Flutter app while completing the course, get a Google-offered Study Jam completion certificate and a profile badge

events.name: GDG DevFest Ado Ekiti
events.description:
Join the Google Developers Groups in Ado Ekiti for #DevFest 2019; the biggest developer conference ever. This event will take place on Saturday, October 19, 2019, and will feature over 20 different sessions planned across multiple parallel tracks on Android, Web, Cloud, Machine Learning and with still more to come.

THEME: LIVING IN THE FUTURE

Together with us this year DevFest is
GDG Akoko
GDG Osogbo
GDG Benin
GDG Cloud Ado Ekiti
DSC EKSU

Be part of history.
Click on the link to share on twitter.
https://ctt.ac/LC_1j
events.how_to_find_us: Follow this link. Google Maps would guide you: https://goo.gl/maps/w1cAvujd72SVtmge6

events.name: Flutter Interact: Viewing Party
events.description:
This year we are hosting a major event, Flutter Interact, on Dec 20, 2019, to announce new features associated with Flutter and other related Google technologies.

The event will be hosted in Ado Ekiti. Check back for the update about Flutter Interact!

events.name: GDG Ado Ekiti Chrome Dev Summit Extended
events.description:
Join us at CDS Extended to watch the Livestream of Chrome Dev Summit 2019 happening at San Francisco, CA.

You'll see YouTube videos, meet other developers, participate in discussions, and interact more on Google Chome.

Chrome Dev Summit is a single-track event so everyone gets the opportunity to attend every session, fueling meaningful discussions among all attendees.

Over the two days, the Chrome team and members of the ecosystem will deep-dive into the latest updates to the platform and tools to improve developer productivity, as they build pinnacle web experiences for their users

#ChromeDevSummit

events.name: FSI HACKATHON - #PayAsYouKnow

venue.name: AB Emporium Hotel and Event Centre

events.description:
How would you innovate Identity and Payment systems to prevent fraud and keep people safe with payments?

The Financial Services Innovators have a goal to make Nigeria a global leader in innovative technology-driven financial services.

This is why The FSI in partnership with GDG and other partners is calling developers across the country who are interested in building innovative FinTech solutions using the Sandbox. The Sandbox is a safe and secure environment where innovators are excited to experiment with their FinTech solutions/ideas without regulatory inhibitions.
Hackathon is aimed at building innovative FinTech Solutions based on APIs available on the FSI sandbox (Access for free: https://sandbox.fsi.ng/)‬.

REGISTER: https://bit.ly/fsi-gdg-hack
MORE INFO: https://fsi.ng/hackathon/

events.name: Firebase Study Jams - Ado-Ekiti
events.description:
Firebase Study Jams 2020 are community-run study groups for developers. This is a great opportunity to come together to learn something in person.

This training will give you a specific skill you can use for personal development or career advancement.

With Firebase Study Jam, you will learn the capabilities of using Firebase for developing Web applications, share your experiences, and solve hands-on problems together.

Who should attend?
Firebase Study Jam is best suited for:
1) those just getting started with developing web apps for desktop and mobile
2) those with programming experience on other mobile app frameworks

Bring a laptop and charger (PC, Mac or Chromebook)! The labs will run on all of the latest versions of popular browsers.

For the best experience check out Get Started with Firebase for Web.

Don’t forget your charger.

events.name: AMP Study Jam - Online
events.description:
AMP (Accelerated Mobile Pages) is an open-source HTML framework created by Google that provides a straightforward way to create web pages that are fast, smooth-loading and prioritize the user-experience above all else.

AMP is an open-source HTML framework created by Google that provides a straightforward way to create web pages that are fast, smooth-loading and prioritize the user-experience above all else.

events.name: IWD

venue.name: AB Emporium Hotel and Event Centre

events.description:
It’s that time of the year again! Women Techmakers is excited to be
supporting and empowering women in technology through our annual global event series in celebration of International Women’s Day (IWD).

events.name: Next Extended Ado Ekiti
events.description:
Join a community of like-minded developers and explore the latest Google Cloud technologies as a team.

Join us for our upcoming Next Extended event, which includes a Cloud Study Jam, and get hands-on experience with Kubernate Solutions.

After the event, you’ll receive 30-days free access to the entire Qwiklabs catalogue, so you can keep developing your skills at home. Complete all of the labs in the session’s quest, and you’ll earn an additional free month of access to Qwiklabs as well as a badge for your online profile.

Bring a laptop and charger (PC, Mac or Chromebook)! The labs will run on all of the latest versions of popular browsers. For the best experience, make sure your laptop has Firefox or Chrome installed. Don’t forget your charger.

upcoming.name: Android 11: The Beta Launch show
upcoming.description: Join us as we unveil new features packed inside the next release, Android 11, as well as updates for developers to help them get the most out of modern Android development.
